solution_line_template: The first ball is a third of the size of the third ball, so it used {third_ball_yarn} / {first_ball_fraction_of_third} = <<{third_ball_yarn}/{first_ball_fraction_of_third}={first_ball_yarn}>>{first_ball_yarn} feet of yarn.

The second ball is twice the size of the first ball, so she used {first_ball_yarn} * {second_ball_multiple_of_first} = <<{first_ball_yarn}*{second_ball_multiple_of_first}={second_ball_yarn}>>{second_ball_yarn} feet of yarn.
